channel.title: english on Val's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in english on Val's Notes

item.title: Basic Practical Networking for the Cloud. Part 1: Networking Fundamentals and VPC
item.description: Networking is a fundamental concept in cloud computing. It allows us to connect various resources within the cloud environment and also for external communication to the internet or private data center. In this series of articles, I hope I can give you enough basic understanding to get it started in the cloud.

item.title: My Journey on Getting Certified As Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer From Zero
item.description: So, you want to be a Google-certified data engineer?

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello! This will be my new blog. I build this with Hugo Framework, so I can focus less on web development and more on the content. Well, let’s see then!
